description: Adds a tag to a resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource to add tags to.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Adds to or modifies the tags of the given resource. Tags are metadata that you can use to manage a resource. (dict) --- A simple label consisting of a customer-defined key-value pair The tag's key value. The tag's value.
